The default JHipster UI is functional but lacks "SaaS sizzle." We’re moving to Angular Material.

Install Material: ```bash ng add @angular/material

Dashboard Layout: Use MatSidenav for navigation and MatGridList for the carbon overview tiles.

Data Visualization: Integrate ngx-charts or D3.js to render the Scope 1, 2, and 3 breakdown.

The "Green" Theme: Customize styles.scss with Material’s new M3 design tokens using custom green-to-slate palettes.
